lead_paragraph: While Detroit has become a top emblem of U.S. urban economic decline with its recent bankruptcy filing, it remains a resilient and vibrant sports town.

headline.main: In Cash-Strapped Detroit, Few Question Sports Arena Funding
headline.print_headline: In Cash-Strapped Detroit, Few Question Sports Arena Funding
